meanings.definition: Relating to the measurement of length, width, height, and depth.
meanings.sent1: The box had a three-dimensional shape.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a beautiful dimensional sculpture.
meanings.sent3: I tried to draw a dimensional house, but it ended up looking like a cube.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination took her to a colorful dimensional world.
meanings.sent5: The movie used impressive dimensional effects to bring the scenes to life.

meanings.sent1: She had a dimensional view on the situation.
meanings.sent2: The issue was more dimensional than they initially thought.
meanings.sent3: His dimensional approach to problem-solving always amazed his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The story had a dimensional twist that caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent5: The dimensional analysis revealed new insights into the problem.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to different levels or layers.
meanings.sent1: The project required a dimensional understanding of the topic.
meanings.sent2: The book had a dimensional plot that kept readers engaged.
meanings.sent3: The dimensional cake had layers of different flavors.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship had a dimensional depth that was rare to find.
meanings.sent5: The music had a dimensional quality that touched the listeners' hearts.
